message.name: ERR_GENLIABILITY_INVALID_CASESTATUS
message.locale: A liability can only be generated on active, suspended or pending closure cases

message.name: ERR_GENLIABILITY_INVALID_SUSPENDSTATUS
message.locale: A liability can only be generated on active or pending closure cases

message.name: ERR_GENLIABILITY_LIABILITYPRODUCTS_ONLY
message.locale: Liabilities can only be issued on liability products

message.name: ERR_GENLIABILITY_INVALID_DELIVERYMETHOD
message.locale: Only cash, check & voucher payments can be generated online
Only cash, cheque & voucher payments can be generated online

message.name: ERR_GENLIABILITY_NOT_DUE_TODAY
message.locale: There is no payment due on this case today

message.name: INF_GENLIABILITY_QUEUED_FOR_GENERATION
message.locale: Payment has been queued for payment generation

message.name: ERR_GENLIABILITY_INVALID_ALL_CASESTATUS
message.locale: A liability can only be generated on active, suspended, closed or pending closure cases

message.name: ERR_GENLIABILITY_INVALID_CLOSEDSTATUS
message.locale: A liability can only be generated on active, closed or pending closure cases
